PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08872024-07-18PSPC, TBS, NCC
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectCollective Agreement between National Capital Commission and Public Service Alliance of Canada
PrecisOrder authorizing the NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION (NCC) to enter into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the PUBLIC SERVICE ALLIANCE OF CANADA (PSAC) that covers all employees in the PSAC Bargaining Unit for the period beginning on January 1, 2022 and ending on December 31, 2025.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order authorizing the NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION (NCC) to enter into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the PUBLIC SERVICE ALLIANCE OF CANADA (PSAC) that covers all employees in the PSAC Bargaining Unit for the period beginning on January 1, 2022 and ending on December 31, 2025.
